016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.neo4j.client;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.lang.Enums;
019import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
020import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
021import org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService;
022import org.neo4j.graphdb.Result;
023import org.neo4j.graphdb.Transaction;
024
025import java.util.HashMap;
026import java.util.Map;
027import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
028import java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage;
029import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
030import java.util.function.Function;
031
032public class GraphDatabase {
033
034    private final Logger logger = LogManager.getLogger("queries.neo4j");
035    private final GraphDatabaseService graphDatabaseService;
036    private Function<Enum<?>, String> defaultFieldMapping;
037
038    public GraphDatabase(GraphDatabaseService graphDatabaseService,
039                         Function<Enum<?>, String> defaultFieldMapping) {
040        this.graphDatabaseService = graphDatabaseService;
041        this.defaultFieldMapping = defaultFieldMapping;
042    }
043
044    public GraphDatabaseService getGraphDatabaseService() {
045        return graphDatabaseService;
046    }
047
048    public GraphQuery query(String baseQuery) {
049        return new GraphQuery(baseQuery, defaultFieldMapping, q ->
050        {
051            String queryString = q.build();
052
053            Map<String, Object> fixedParams = new HashMap<String, Object>(q.getParameters().size());
054            for (Map.Entry<Enum<?>, Object> param : q.getParameters().entrySet()) {
055                fixedParams.put(Enums.toField(param.getKey()), param.getValue());
056            }
057
058            return execute(queryString, fixedParams, q.getTimeout());
059        });
060    }
061
062    public CompletionStage<GraphResult> execute(String cypherQuery, Map<String, Object> parameters, long timeout) {
063
064        CompletableFuture<GraphResult> future = new CompletableFuture<>();
065
066        Transaction tx = graphDatabaseService.beginTx(timeout, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
067        try {
068            Result result = tx.execute(cypherQuery, parameters);
069            future.complete(new GraphResult(tx, result, ()->
070            {
071                logger.debug( cypherQuery.replace( '\n', ' ' ));
072            }));
073        } catch (Throwable e) {
074            future.completeExceptionally(e);
075        }
076
077        return future;
078    }
079}
